name: Smaller Projects
description:
Game Of BIke

During winter I was bored and woke up one day and decided to make a game of bike app for android. The game helps come up with tricks and keep track of current players letters and order. It has the ability to ban certain tricks and it auto generates tricks. 

After a bit of testing i realized the randomness generated a bit too hard tasks sometimes and therefor implemented the skip which also serves as a learning tool for the app to ban that particular combination.

The game is entirely made in UI elements and was created in about 2-3 hours.

TRASH PILER

During the winter semester we were assigned to create a simple mobile game.....        so I created another one.

This time I were sitting in the car thinking what would be the perfect toiletbreak game.

From nowhere the game popped up. I wanted to create a shittier tetris-ish game that were all about piling trash the most efficient you could. The game drops 5 random items in a random rotation and your goal is to place it using swipes to rotate the can and move the item side to side.The game took about 3 hours to make.
